official_title: Project Limb Rescue: A Pilot Study Evaluating the Feasibility of Transcutaneous Sensors for the Detection of Cancer-Related Lymphedema
inclusion_criteria:
* COHORT A: Healthy participants
* COHORT B: Participants with pre-existing lymphedema
* COHORT B: A history of cancer therapy with surgery or radiation involving the axillary basin
* COHORT B: Unilateral upper extremity swelling that requires compression or pneumatic therapy or a >= 2-centimeter difference in contralateral arm circumference
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
Must have maximum age of 90 Years
exclusion_criteria: * Patients with active malignancy or ongoing cancer therapy will be excluded, though breast cancer patients currently on endocrine monotherapy will be included
